Structs/CollectionMetadata.html.name: CollectionMetadata

Structs/QueryPlanner.html.name: QueryPlanner

Structs/IndexStat.html.name: IndexStat
Structs/IndexStat.html.abstract: A structure representing statistical information about an index.

Structs/ShardStat.html.name: ShardStat

Classes/NyaruDB2.html#/s:8NyaruDB2AAC14d.abstract: Drops the specified collection from the database.

Classes/NyaruDB2.html#/s:8NyaruDB2AAC18g.abstract: Retrieves the statistics for a specified collection.

Classes/DocumentCollection.html#/s:8Nyar.name: fetch(query:shardKey:shardValue:)

Classes/DocumentCollection.html#/s:8Nyar.name: delete(where:)

Classes/DocumentCollection.html#/s:8Nyar.name: query()
Classes/DocumentCollection.html#/s:8Nyar.abstract: Asynchronously creates a query for documents of the specified type.

Classes/CollectionCatalog.html#/s:8Nyaru.abstract: Creates a new collection with the specified parameters.

Actors/IndexManager.html#/s:8NyaruDB212I.abstract: Searches for records in the database that match the specified field and value.

Actors/BTreeIndex.html#/s:8NyaruDB210BTr.name: init(minimumDegree:)
Actors/BTreeIndex.html#/s:8NyaruDB210BTr.abstract: Initializes a new instance of the BTreeIndex with a specified minimum degree.

Actors/BTreeIndex.html#/s:8NyaruDB210BTr.abstract: Searches for the specified key in the B-Tree index and returns the associated data.

Actors/BTreeIndex.html#/s:8NyaruDB210BTr.name: loadPersistedIndex(from:)
Actors/BTreeIndex.html#/s:8NyaruDB210BTr.abstract: Loads a persisted index from the provided data.

Actors/BTreeIndex.html#/s:8NyaruDB210BTr.name: loadPersistedIndex(from:)
Actors/BTreeIndex.html#/s:8NyaruDB210BTr.abstract: Loads a persisted index from the specified file URL.

Actors/BTreeIndex.html#/s:8NyaruDB210BTr.name: insert(key:data:)

Actors/BTreeIndex.html#/s:8NyaruDB210BTr.name: inOrder()

Actors/BTreeIndex.html.name: BTreeIndex

Actors/IndexManager.html.name: IndexManager

Actors/StorageEngine.html.name: StorageEngine
